title: Viable Adc buildpath?
body:
Sick of hitting Malphites and Lee Sins for 40 damage. It seems like no matter what you build, you do no damage until 5-6 items.


What do you build and when?

replies.body:
Agreed it is not shack-oh its shake-oh

If they get lots of armour early buy your armour pen as 3rd

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Z8UQ21J4,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-27T11:06:33.552+0000)
>
> Its shark-oh

thats even worse than shack-oh

Depends if they stacking hp or armour. ADCs as a class generally dont do damage until they get 3 items or so. Thats why they need a support. They scale with items more so than levels.

AD items - Zeal item - Boots are the main 3 items you will almost always build on ADCs every game.

The 3rd major item depends on what you need. Mortal Reminder or Dominiks for armour stacking champs and Bork for HP stacking champs (or both in some cases). 4th you build either another zeal item or lifesteal or QSS if needed. FInal item is one of the other items posed in part 4 or a defensive item.

Don't play ADC is probably the best answer you will get.

But the standard ADC build is mostly triple crit with Warlords.

Shiv(/Runnan's)>IE>PD(/Shiv)>Last Whisper item>Defensive.
Isn't BF> shiv> IE> either defensive item or second zeal item or armour pen depending on the match> lifesteal item/second zeal item>GA
